薓字的基本解释

薓
shēn
古同“参”，人参、党参等的总称。

薓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》所今切，平侵，生。］
“參1”的古字。亦作“葠1”。亦作“蓡1”。“蔘2”的古字。
今写作“參”。也作“葠”。

薓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薓； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1061第11
【唐韻】所金切，音森。【說文】人薓，藥草。【本草】一名神草，一名人銜，一名地精。年深浸漸長成者，根如人形，故謂之人薓。薓字从?，亦?漸之意。【唐書·地理志】太原府土貢人薓。　又【博雅】鹿腸，元薓。苦心，沙薓。【本草】人薓、元薓、沙薓、丹薓、苦薓，共爲五薓。　又【集韻】詩廉切，音苫。同苫，喪藉也。　【集韻】人薓薓字或作葠、蔘。【六書正譌】从艸?聲。或作參，非。

薓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薓字的起名意思

暂无。

薓
Basic explanation of words
薓
shēn
In ancient times, "ginseng" is a general term for ginseng and dangshen.
薓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is cut today, flat invaded, and born. ]
The ancient character of "reference 1". Also referred to as "reference 1". Also referred to as "reference 1". The ancient word "Ginseng 2".
Today is written as "participation". Also used as "participation".
薓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　薓; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1061 to 11
[Tang Yun] All gold cut, Yinsen. [Said the text] people, medicinal herbs. [Materia Medica] One god grass, one title, and one goblin. Those who are deeply immersed and mature in years have roots like a human form, so they are called human beings. The word 薓 starts from ?, which also means “gradual”. [Book of Tang·Geography] The native tribute of Taiyuan Mansion.　[Bo Ya] Deer intestines, Yuan Ling. Painstakingly, Sha Liao. 【Materia Medica】Human 薓, Yuan 薓, Sha 薓, Dan 薓, bitter 薓, a total of five 薓.　[Jiyun] Poetry Lianqie, the sound is long. With thatch, bereavement also.　【Jiyun】Ren 薓薓 word or as ginseng, ginseng. [Liu Shu Zhengzhen] Cong Jian? Sound. Or as a reference, not.
